description: The water-resistant Ulele sandal you know and love, in a slide silhouette. Designed to channel the feel of a sneaker, Ulele ‘Olu will keep you comfortable on the beach, on the boat, and anywhere in between.
name: Olukai Ulele Olu - Mens

specs.value: Made with a water-resistant silicone-coated material, soft, French terry lining, and a puffy strap that feels like your favorite beach towel against the foot
The soft, brushed EVA midsole delivers all-day support and cushioning
Non-marking 'Wet Grip Rubber' outsole adds traction on wet surfaces
